remarks: The inner product operation is a function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ipffn.1 $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipffn.2 $e |- ., = ( .if ` W ) $.
phlipf.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phlipf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
phlipf $p |- ( W e. PreHil -> ., : ( V X. V ) --> K ) $.
